overview: Ask anyone what they want, and they will give you a variety of answers. Probe a little deeper, especially with twinks, and they will most likely tell you that what they want most is love. Intimacy. Someone to connect with and share their passions. Of course, there will always be those that want just a little more. Like Chris Summers, Zack Love, Timber Harvest, Marcus Tresor, Justin Stone, and Anton Marceau. Yes, they want to love. They want intimacy. And they definitely want to share their passion. But what they want most? Raw, hardcore, primal sex with just a touch of romantic sensuality. Fucking beautiful.
title: What I Want Most
